title: Rusk Deepshine Keratin Care Smoothing Conditioner Unisex, 12 Ounce
description: A sodium chloride-free, color-safe, nourishing daily conditioner. For all hair types, including anyone with chemically or colortreated hair.Replenishes moisture levels and instantly nourishes dull, weak hair. Helps to restore hair's elasticity, strength and vibrancy. Natural keratin moisturizes and restores youthful shine to hair.

title: Deepshine Keratin Care Smoothing Shampoo by Rusk, 12 Ounce
description: A gentle cleansing formula recommended for chemically and color treated hair. Formulated with natural keratin, vitamins and nourishing marine botanicals, it keeps hair smooth and shiny and provides long lasting protection during thermal styling.

title: Macadamia Natural Oil Deep Repair Masque, 3.3 Fluid Ounce
description: Macadamia deep repair masque is a revitalizing hair reconstructor for dry, damaged hair. A combination of Macadamia Oil and argan oil along with tea tree oil, chamomile oil, aloe and algae extracts rejuvenate and rebuild the hair. Macadamia Natural Oil deep repair masque is a revitalizing hair reconstructor for dry, damaged hair.
